sourcesContent:
Название Тип Действия
{{box.name}} {{box.type}} Изменить Удалить
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BoxService } from '../box.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Box } from '../class/box'; import { AppService } from '../app.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-box-list', templateUrl: './box-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./box-list.component.css'] }) export class BoxListComponent { boxes? : Box[]; constructor(public app: AppService,private boxServ : BoxService,private router: Router){ } ngOnInit() :void { this.boxServ.findAll().subscribe(data => { this.boxes = data; }); } remove(id : number){ this.boxServ.deleteBox(id).subscribe(() =>{ this.router.navigate(['/redirect_box']); } ); } }
